tools.name: upstash_redis_get
tools.description: Get value by key from Redis

tools.name: upstash_redis_set
tools.description: Set a Redis key-value pair with optional TTL

tools.name: upstash_redis_incr
tools.description: Increment the integer value of a key by 1

tools.name: upstash_redis_decr
tools.description: Decrement the integer value of a key by 1

tools.name: upstash_redis_incrby
tools.description: Increment the integer value of a key by a specific amount

tools.name: upstash_redis_decrby
tools.description: Decrement the integer value of a key by a specific amount

tools.name: upstash_redis_incrbyfloat
tools.description: Increment the float value of a key

tools.name: upstash_redis_append
tools.description: Append a value to a key

tools.name: upstash_redis_setrange
tools.description: Overwrite part of string at offset

tools.name: upstash_redis_strlen
tools.description: Get the length of the value stored in a key

tools.name: upstash_redis_getset
tools.description: Set key to value and return old value

tools.name: upstash_redis_setnx
tools.description: Set key to value only if key does not exist

tools.name: upstash_redis_setex
tools.description: Set key to value with expiration in seconds

tools.name: upstash_redis_psetex
tools.description: Set key to value with expiration in milliseconds

tools.name: upstash_redis_expire
tools.description: Set expiration time for a key in seconds

tools.name: upstash_redis_expireat
tools.description: Set expiration time for a key as Unix timestamp

tools.name: upstash_redis_ttl
tools.description: Get TTL (time to live) for a key in seconds

tools.name: upstash_redis_pttl
tools.description: Get TTL for a key in milliseconds

tools.name: upstash_redis_persist
tools.description: Remove the expiration from a key

tools.name: upstash_redis_keys
tools.description: Find all keys matching a pattern

tools.name: upstash_redis_type
tools.description: Get the type of a key

tools.name: upstash_redis_dbsize
tools.description: Get total number of keys in database

tools.name: upstash_redis_flushdb
tools.description: Clear all keys in current database (DANGEROUS)

tools.name: upstash_redis_flushall
tools.description: Clear all keys in all databases (DANGEROUS)

tools.name: upstash_redis_info
tools.description: Get Redis server information and statistics

tools.name: upstash_redis_lastsave
tools.description: Get Unix timestamp of last successful save

tools.name: upstash_redis_publish
tools.description: Publish a message to a channel

tools.name: upstash_redis_pipeline
tools.description: Execute multiple commands in a single HTTP request (batch)

tools.name: upstash_redis_hget
tools.description: Get field value from a hash

tools.name: upstash_redis_hgetall
tools.description: Get all fields and values from a hash

tools.name: upstash_redis_hdel
tools.description: Delete one or more hash fields

tools.name: upstash_redis_hexists
tools.description: Check if a hash field exists

tools.name: upstash_redis_hkeys
tools.description: Get all field names in a hash

tools.name: upstash_redis_hvals
tools.description: Get all values in a hash

tools.name: upstash_redis_hlen
tools.description: Get the number of fields in a hash

tools.name: upstash_redis_hsetnx
tools.description: Set hash field only if it does not exist

tools.name: upstash_redis_hstrlen
tools.description: Get length of hash field value

tools.name: upstash_redis_lpush
tools.description: Prepend one or multiple values to a list

tools.name: upstash_redis_rpush
tools.description: Append one or multiple values to a list

tools.name: upstash_redis_lpop
tools.description: Remove and get the first element in a list

tools.name: upstash_redis_rpop
tools.description: Remove and get the last element in a list

tools.name: upstash_redis_lrange
tools.description: Get a range of elements from a list

tools.name: upstash_redis_llen
tools.description: Get the length of a list

tools.name: upstash_redis_lindex
tools.description: Get element at index in list

tools.name: upstash_redis_lset
tools.description: Set element at index in list

tools.name: upstash_redis_linsert
tools.description: Insert element before or after pivot in list

tools.name: upstash_redis_rpoplpush
tools.description: Remove last element from list and push to another list

tools.name: upstash_redis_lpos
tools.description: Get position of element in list

tools.name: upstash_redis_lmove
tools.description: Move element from one list to another

tools.name: upstash_redis_sadd
tools.description: Add one or more members to a set

tools.name: upstash_redis_smembers
tools.description: Get all members of a set

tools.name: upstash_redis_srem
tools.description: Remove one or more members from a set

tools.name: upstash_redis_sismember
tools.description: Check if a value is a member of a set

tools.name: upstash_redis_scard
tools.description: Get the number of members in a set

tools.name: upstash_redis_spop
tools.description: Remove and return random member from set

tools.name: upstash_redis_smove
tools.description: Move member from one set to another

tools.name: upstash_redis_sdiffstore
tools.description: Difference of sets and store result

tools.name: upstash_redis_zadd
tools.description: Add one or more members to a sorted set with scores

tools.name: upstash_redis_zrange
tools.description: Get a range of members from a sorted set by index

tools.name: upstash_redis_zrem
tools.description: Remove one or more members from a sorted set

tools.name: upstash_redis_zscore
tools.description: Get the score of a member in a sorted set

tools.name: upstash_redis_zcard
tools.description: Get the number of members in a sorted set

tools.name: upstash_redis_zrank
tools.description: Get the rank of a member in a sorted set

tools.name: upstash_redis_zrevrank
tools.description: Get the reverse rank of a member in a sorted set

tools.name: upstash_redis_zrangebyscore
tools.description: Get members in sorted set by score range

tools.name: upstash_redis_zrevrangebyscore
tools.description: Get members in sorted set by score range (reverse order)

tools.name: upstash_redis_zpopmin
tools.description: Remove and return members with lowest scores

tools.name: upstash_redis_zpopmax
tools.description: Remove and return members with highest scores

tools.name: upstash_redis_zincrby
tools.description: Increment score of member in sorted set

tools.name: upstash_redis_zunionstore
tools.description: Union sorted sets and store result

tools.name: upstash_redis_zinterstore
tools.description: Intersect sorted sets and store result

tools.name: upstash_redis_georadiusbymember
tools.description: Query members within radius of a member

tools.name: upstash_redis_geosearch
tools.description: Search for members in geospatial index

tools.name: upstash_redis_setbit
tools.description: Set or clear bit at offset

tools.name: upstash_redis_bitcount
tools.description: Count set bits in a string

tools.name: upstash_redis_bitpos
tools.description: Find first bit set to 0 or 1

tools.name: upstash_redis_xread
tools.description: Read entries from one or more streams

tools.name: upstash_redis_xrange
tools.description: Get range of entries from a stream

tools.name: upstash_redis_xrevrange
tools.description: Get range of entries from a stream (reverse order)

tools.name: upstash_redis_xlen
tools.description: Get the length of a stream
